entry.title: Setting page item values with JS from a report or link
entry.summary: Simple use case, you can set multiple items by calling apex.item().set_value multiple times in the same statement: javascript:apex.item("P4_LOC").setValue("#LOC#"); apex.item("P4_DEPTNO").setValue("#DEPTNO#"); A better practice would be to create a JavaScript function that does your dirty deeds and the call that once: javascript:MyFunction(#LOC#, #DEPTNO#);
entry.content:
Simple use case, you can set multiple items by calling apex.item().set_value multiple times in the same statement:

javascript:apex.item("P4_LOC").setValue("#LOC#"); apex.item("P4_DEPTNO").setValue("#DEPTNO#");

A better practice would be to create a JavaScript function that does your dirty deeds and the call that once:

javascript:MyFunction(#LOC#, #DEPTNO#);
